name: MagicCraft
description:
MagicCraft is a PVP Multiplayer Online Battle Arena game (MOBA).

Launching first with 16 main characters, each with different traits, skills, powers and abilities, the MagicCraft world is completely scalable, built to gradually expand from a MOBA game into a complex and challenging massively multiplayer metaverse experience.

Prepare to embark on a thrilling adventure in a world of magic and wonder. Cast spells, brew potions, and team up with other players to take on epic quests and battles. With regular updates and events, the excitement never ends.
